BR_text.BRsummary: SArray.show() is not working in Jupyter Notebook
BR_text.BRdescription:
Here is my code in Jupyter Notebook
 import turicreate as tc
 products = tc.SFrame('amazon_baby.gl')
 products['name'].show()
 Above code shows nothing but a string ''Materializing SArray''
 products.show() is working fine.

comments_0.comment_text:
Thanks @The-Code-Killer for reporting this. I was able to reproduce the issue.
 Here is a more minimalistic way to reproduce the issue:
 <denchmark-code>import turicreate as tc
 
 sa = tc.SArray([""Firsts""])
 sa.show()
 </denchmark-code>
 
 We'll look in to it.

comments_1.comment_text:
Thanks. I am waiting for it <denchmark-link:https://github.com/TobyRoseman>@TobyRoseman</denchmark-link>

comments_2.comment_text: Hey @The-Code-Killer looks like we have a potential fix for it. Try it out and let us know if that works for you!
